page.title: 12Recreation in Banchory
page.content: { Primary School Children: {Clubs-}Scouts,Girl Guides,Brownies, Football,Cricket,Pony Club. {Hobbies-}swimming,horse riding,roller skating,drawing,cricket,jogging, cycling,tennis,fishing,football, badminton. {Secondary School Pupils:} {Clubs-}Youth Club,Scouts,Ski Club, Maroc(orienteering),Pony Club, Girl Guides. {Hobbies-}ice skating,horse riding, jogging,rallying,radio control cars, BMX bikes,football,snooker,squash. {Adults: {Clubs-}Aerobics,Yoga,Maroc,Field Club, National Trust,Save the Children, Women's Institute,Girl Guides, , {Hobbies-}reading,knitting,weaving, sketching,walking,gardening,flower arranging,jogging,motor sport, orienteering,motoring.
